about_the_game:
Dive into an immersive Viking adventure where your mettle will be tested. Stand tall as the shield against marauding orcs, defying turbulent storms to safeguard your people and sacred lands. Wield your formidable axe, traverse untamed wilderness, and uncover vital resources concealed within time-worn chests and crates, ensuring your legacy as a true hero of the North.



At the heart of this saga stands our Viking champion, bearing an ancestral axe of unmatched power. This enchanted weapon can be flung at foes with deadly precision, only to return to your hand when summoned. A symbiotic relationship emerges between warrior and danger, as mystical tattoos ablaze with ethereal light signal imminent threats nearby. With each swing and every throw, the hero's destiny intertwines with the rhythm of battle, driven by an unbreakable spirit.

Viking Survival merely scratches the surface of a grand narrative waiting to unfold. Should this chapter resonate with our player community, the saga will flourish through upcoming DLC expansions. Be part of our journey to forge new maps, diverse characters, and uncharted challenges. Your support serves as the cornerstone upon which we build a richer, vaster realm of adventure, where the Viking hero's legend finds its fullest expression.



Content with us
detailed_description:
Early Beta Access

I'm thrilled to announce that I've been working tirelessly as the solo developer on a game called "Viking Survival," and I'm now at a stage where I need your help! 🎮

"Viking Survival" is an exciting adventure set in a harsh and unforgiving world plagued by evil monsters. But before I release it to the world, I want to make sure it's the best it can be, and that's where you come in!

I'm looking for dedicated playtesters to help me fine-tune the game and provide valuable feedback. If you're passionate about games like Diablo 3 combined with a roguelike element or just want to be a part of the development process, I'd love to have you on board.

By participating in the playtest, you'll get a sneak peek of "Viking Survival" and the opportunity to shape its further development. Plus, as a token of my appreciation, I'll provide you with a beta key so you can dive right into the Viking world I've created.

If you're interested in becoming a playtester, please reach out to me through Discord. There won't be any NDA or legal matters as it is just a small indie game (and my first commercial one). Let's embark on this epic adventure together and make "Viking Survival" a game to remember!

Thank you for your support, and I can't wait to hear from you!

Skål! 🍻

short_description: Embark on an epic Viking saga, standing as the last line of defense against marauding orcs. Guide your hero through wild storms, wielding a magical axe to safeguard your tribe and territory. Uncover hidden treasures within ancient chests and crates, fortifying your journey with vital resources.
